column4: Hi there. I managed to get ubuntu up and running off the live CD by removing "Quiet" and "Splash" from the startup options and adding "noapic acpi=off", and install it. Now when I try to start it up off my HD, it gets stuck about... I dunno, 15% of the way loading.
Any way to fix that that anyone knows of?

Hi there. I managed to get ubuntu up and running off the live CD by removing "Quiet" and "Splash" from the startup options and adding "noapic acpi=off", and install it. Now when I try to start it up off my HD, it gets stuck about... I dunno, 15% of the way loading.
